title: .anon0 redeclared in this block
body:
by **Thomas.Shadwell**: 
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?
http://play.golang.org/p/JL-OCq5WJo

2. What is the full compiler output?
prog.go:1: .anon0 redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at prog.go:1

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
6g version go1.0.3
